name: Plague Runner
description:
Play as the Plague Runner. Times have gotten tough. The bodies are piling high, and the air is thick with the stench of plague. Your task as the solitary grave keeper is to put these poor souls to rest. (Rate at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/plague-runner)

Controls:

  • Movement : WASD
  • Interact: Mouse LMB

Tips:

  • A small cursor will indicate where you are aiming. You can only interact with certain items.
  • Corpses will appear at the bottom left of the map near the mound.
